data.event: The Galera Point Lighthouse in Toco was built in 1897 and today is surrounded by a park and picnic area.
The Galera Point Lighthouse in Toco was built in 1897 and today is surrounded by a park and picnic area.

event.title: took place in Toco after the Spanish colonized Trinidad in 1531

data.event: Not much activity took place in Toco after the Spanish colonized Trinidad in 1531 until 1631, when Sir Henry Colt and English forces entered the territory without the knowledge of the Spanish.

event.title: 1631, when Sir Henry Colt and English forces entered

data.event: Not much activity took place in Toco after the Spanish colonized Trinidad in 1531 until 1631, when Sir Henry Colt and English forces entered the territory without the knowledge of the Spanish.
In 1637, the British were expelled by the Dutch, who had formed an alliance with the Amerindians in the area and were, not too long after, expelled by the Spanish.
